amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for AN/SLQ-25D Integration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 449 printed in Part B of House Report 111-233 to prohibit funding for AN/SLQ-25D Integration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 338, 11 Present (Roll no. 669).
